t: Make wishes come true: Shop online on Amazon.sg and ‘cart out’ smiles for children in need
s: December 12, 2022 - For its annual Delivering Smiles campaign and as part of its community efforts in Singapore, Amazon is ramping up the Amazon x Shop for Good Wishlist initiative to connect more people with charities and children in Singapore.

March 31, 2025 - Every gift purchased from our Amazon Wishlist not only brings smiles to children’s faces but also reduces our spending on essential items, allowing us to grant even more wishes to children who need them most.
